directions: In a bowl, mix the rum, soy sauce, lime juice, brown sugar, garlic, ginger, thyme, salt, pepper, hot pepper sauce, and serrano pepper. Pierce the chicken on all sides with a fork. Place chicken in a shallow container, and cover with the marinade. Seal container, and marinate chicken in the refrigerator 8 hours or overnight.
Lightly oil grill grate. Discard marinade and place chicken on the grill. Cook 8 minutes on each side, or until juices run clear.
ingredients: 2 1/2 tablespoons finely minced fresh ginger root
hot pepper sauce (e.g. Tabasco™) to taste (optional)
4 pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast halves
title: Grilled Caribbean Free Range Chicken
